belbinTest.description: This test consists of 7 separate blocks with 8 questions or statements each, with which you can agree or disagree. You have 10 points for each block. You can assign points to no more than 3 or 4 statements in a block. If you completely agree with a statement (100%), you can give it all 10 points. At the same time, a minimum of 2 points can be assigned to a statement. Make sure that the total number of points for each block does not exceed 10.

emotionalIntelligenceTest.description: This test helps determine a person's level of emotional intelligence by assessing their ability to recognize, understand, and manage their own and others' emotions.

categories.name: Recognizing Others' Emotions
categories.description: Influencing the emotional state of those around

criticalThinkingTest.description: The Critical Thinking Test assesses your ability to reason logically through an argument and make objective decisions. You may need to evaluate a situation, recognize assumptions, formulate hypotheses, and assess arguments.
